name: JARTONLock
0:
”Alexa, lock door lock”
”Alexa, lock the door lock.”
”Alexa,lock my door lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. Gateway- sold separately
2. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the JARTON Lock app is able to lock/unlock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the JARTON Lock app is able to “remotely” lock/unlock using the gateway

3. Enable the JARTON Lock skill in Alexa

4. Link the JARTON Lock account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the door lock
(door lock is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in the JARTON Lock app)
Alexa, unlock the door lock
(you should enable unlock feature in Alexa app)
